snippet: Albertsons, one of the biggest supermarket chains in the United States, set the price range for its initial public offering on Friday, saying it plans to raise as much as $1.9 billion.
abstract: Supermarket chain Albertsons sets price range for its initial public offering between $23 and $26 a share, and hopes to raise as much as $1.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: Albertsons, one of the biggest supermarket chains in the United States, set the price range for its initial public offering on Friday, saying it plans to raise as much as $1.9 billion.

headline.main: Albertsons Prices I.P.O. at $23 to $26 a Share
headline.print_headline: Albertsons Prices I.P.O. at $23 to $26 a Share
